imdb.title: Bakuretsu tenshi
imdb.plot: In a chaotic future Tokyo, a young aspiring chef is employed by four beautiful mercenaries.

episodes.title: Hell Silently Approaches
episodes.plot: Kyouhei is a culinary student who needs a new job. Luckily, his teacher passes him just the right flier.

episodes.title: The Heartless Gunfighter
episodes.plot: A mysterious Cybot has kidnapped Meg, and there are more questions than answers as to it who controls it.

episodes.title: The City Where the Beast Howls
episodes.plot: As Kyouhei continues to ponder quitting his overly stressful job, the girls are given a new assignment: Find a crazed man named Wong and bring him in alive.

episodes.title: Brothers, Death at Dawn
episodes.plot: A runaway freight train and a mutant monster gone berserk leaves Meg fighting for her life!

episodes.title: The Mansion Where an Evil Spirit Squirms
episodes.plot: Meg goes undercover at an elite girls' school to investigate the strange case of a young student's descent into insanity.

episodes.title: Wash the Flower Garden in Blood!
episodes.plot: After Meg is sent to investigate the strange goings on at an elite prep school, Jo comes in as backup and none too soon!

episodes.title: Black Sky
episodes.plot: A mysterious giant bird preys on young girls and Meg is snatched up before Jo's very eyes!

episodes.title: The Scarred Fugitive
episodes.plot: Jo and Kyo are on the run in the city and Sei's hot on their trail!

episodes.title: Party of the Dragon
episodes.plot: When Meg and Amy accompany Sei to her grandfather's exclusive boat party, they're in for more than just a soiree.

episodes.title: The Cyberbrain on the Extra Land
episodes.plot: When someone hacks into Amy's computer and humiliates her, she goes on the warpath! Sneaking off with Kyo to the electronics mart, they soon find themselves sucked into another world filled with cybernetic creatures determined to make them stay! Will they escape or will Kyo and Amy become just another set of human machines?

episodes.title: Eastern Angel, Western Hawk
episodes.plot: When Jo is sent to protect a star athlete things get crazy, and a giant bug is on the loose!

episodes.title: Tower of Tears
episodes.plot: Has Jo met her match when she's hauled in by an elite, Hawk Squad Cop?

episodes.title: Decisive Battle! Naniwa's Gang of Young Toughs
episodes.plot: The city of Osaka is under siege due to Iriki's tyrannical actions, and Takane finds herself, as well as the people she needs to defend, backed against the wall. With Meg being held hostage, Sei finds herself on a short leash in dealing with Iriki, as any brash moves could spell a fatal end for her colleague

episodes.title: Wild Kids
episodes.plot: In this flashback, we follow a young Meg who lives on the streets with three other homeless children who are forced into petty theft to stay alive.

episodes.title: Ocean, Swimsuit, and a Huge Aquatic Beast
episodes.plot: Sei and the others are enjoying a summer day at a revolutionary new water park located in the middle of the ocean, but a day in paradise turns into a nightmare when a greedy Executive for the park decides to sabotage the grand opening.

episodes.title: The Mysterious World of the Demon Fighter
episodes.plot: When Meg and Jo are sent to stop a cold-blooded killer, Jo begins to suffer painful visions. A routine Jango session with Leo leads to a violent attack and Jo is on the run. A formidable foe and a ghostly warrior send Jo into a battle for her very soul!

episodes.title: Clash! The Two Angels
episodes.plot: A rogue demon wreaks havoc and destruction on a mysterious village.

episodes.title: The Immortal Classmate
episodes.plot: Kyo runs into an old friend from school and finds himself running for his life!

episodes.title: 24-Hour Conspiracy
episodes.plot: Takane remains a somewhat unwelcome guest of the girls until she visits the set of her favorite soap opera and falls victim to a mysterious mind control device. When Takane is abducted from the hospital it's up to the girls to find and rescue her from the clutches of sinister men behind the mind control. Will they find her in time? And if they do, will they be able to fight off the powerful force holding her under their control?

episodes.title: Highway Genocide
episodes.plot: A new cybernetic police unit is put into commission in order to patrol the highways and keep the peace. But what happens when the regulators become unregulated? As the unit goes haywire the government struggles to regain control, but their efforts are in vain. Then the malfunctioning unit sets its lethal eyes on Takane. Can she escape it's malicious glare?

episodes.title: Bullets in the Iron Gravestone
episodes.plot: Another terrorist attack rocks the city and grips the citizens with fear. But the girls won't be saving Tokyo this time: they've been de-commissioned! Will Sei and Jo make it through another mutant attack? Will Meg get back to the team before it's too late?

episodes.title: The Devil You Love
episodes.plot: The truth behind Jo's existence is revealed and nothing seems the same. Meg is cornered by a strange woman from Jo's past and finds herself in the clutches of evil. Glenford tightens his grip on Tokyo as dark clouds move in overhead! Will Sei find a way to makes things right again? Or will Jo be left floating in oblivion?

episodes.title: Execution Ground on the Red Ocean
episodes.plot: While RAPT controls the entire city of Tokyo, as well as the news media, Maria awaits the final battle she was originally programmed for.

episodes.title: Angel, Burst!
episodes.plot: While Meg and Jo wash up on one of the Red Ocean's beaches, Sei is told by her Grandfather to follow her own path to happiness. Taking this opportunity for what it's worth, she devises a plan to destroy not only RAPT, but the dominance it has commanded over Tokyo. All she has to do is reassembling the team to do it.
